member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.Configuration.ConfigurationManager
member.summary: Provides methods for sending device configuration files to Configuration Manager for either complete processing, or just for testing.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.#ctor
member.summary: The private constructor for the ConfigurationManager class. This ensure that new ConfigurationManager objects are not instantiated from the public default constructor.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.ProcessConfiguration(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a device configuration file to Configuration Manager for processing.
member.param: The configuration document used to provision the device.
true to return metadata associated with the XML parm elements in the new configuration; otherwise, false.
member.returns: metadata associated with the XML parm elements in this configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.TestConfiguration(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a device configuration file to Configuration Manager for testing.
member.remarks: Configuration Manager will not process the configuration file, but it can still return useful metadata associated with the XML parm elements.
member.param: The configuration document used to provision the device.
true to return metadata associated with the XML parm elements in the new configuration; otherwise, false.
member.returns: metadata associated with the XML parm elements in this configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.MainConfigurator(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.UInt32)
member.summary: MainConfigurator calls DMProcessConfigXML directly, and manages the memory allocation of the result.
